title: How to file a support complaint?
content:
How does one file a complaint against Google Hardware Support *and* get an official response?

I love Google Fi, my Pixel 4 XL, and Google devices in general. But it has been two weeks since I tried to get information on making a warranty claim, and all I get are responses from "Larry" saying that they're having issues confirming my warranty.

I got so frustrated with hearing "Your patience is highly appreciated." that I created a website with all of the conversations and emails.

https://GoogleSupportNightmare.com/
